channel.title: 317 Suggest Command
channel.description: I want to know how to put the suggest command inside of my server, and how to set it up to where it goes to a certain txt document. if anyone can give me the command in a Delta source type of form, that would be really nice

item.title: 317 Suggest Command
item.dc:creator: @shmidlap123 shmidlap123
item.description:
@shmidlap123 wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“suggest”)) {
sendMessage(“Sending…”);
sendMessage(“Suggestion Succesfully Sent To Mod Allstar!”);
BufferedWriter bw = null;
String suggestion = command.substring(8);

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("suggestions.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + ": " + suggestion);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error Suggesting");
                }
            }
        }
    }[/code]

Might work, might not, im not sure.

Read full topic
